app.title: AI Photo Editor - Lumii
app.description:
Lumii, as a powerful photo editor pro, provides all the features you need for photo editing. As one of the best pic editing apps, offer 100+ stylish preset photo filters and effects to edit photos. No ads while editing.

Create artistic, high-quality photos effortlessly‚Äîno professional skills required. Whether you‚Äôre a newbie or a pro, Lumii will be your best choice as photo filters editing apps among plenty of similar photo maker and presets photography apps. Apply photo filters for pictures and fill your aesthetic needs.

What you can do with Lumii (FREE and All-in-one Photo Editor Pro):

üëì Customize Photo Filters 
‚ú¶ Exquisitely designed filters for pictures, presets for Instagram, make your photos stand out.
‚ú¶ Add custom exclusive photo filters and effects, such as Film, LOMO , Retro, etc.
‚ú¶ Fine adjustment for photo filters and effects strength

‚ú®  100+ Photo Effects
‚ú¶ Exquisitely designed effects for picture, make your photos stand out. Top photo effects pro.
‚ú¶ Add popular photo effects, such as Glitch, Light Leak & Double Exposure

üñº Auto Background Eraser
‚ú¶ Easy to repair or erase unwanted part with background eraser
‚ú¶ Mix your cutout photo with exquisite preset background
‚ú¶ Best bg remover app, just one tap to change background

üåü Useful & Fun AI Edits
‚ú¶ AI Photo Enhancer: Unblur/enhance image quality, turn your portrait or group photos into HD
‚ú¶ AI Avatar: Explore Anime Avatars
‚ú¶ Quick Erase: Remove unwanted objects with offline convenience
‚ú¶ AI Remove: Automatically detect and remove unwanted objects

üé® Free HSL Color
‚ú¶ Easily control Hue, Saturation, Luminance (HSL), support 8 colors channels, intuitive lightroom effect photo editor pro
‚ú¶Totally FREE and advanced HSL adjustments

üç≠ Curves for Photos
‚ú¶Powerful curves tools, pro level darkroom effect photo editor for Instagram
‚ú¶Advanced adjustment with 4 color options
‚ú¶Free picture editor, photo filters and effects with curves and colors

‚úçÔ∏è Add text to photos
‚ú¶Add text on photo, with lots of Fonts and Stylish Text Presets for selecting
‚ú¶Add text on photo, and apply different styles
‚ú¶Best pic editor and photo lab with text

‚òÄÔ∏è Double Exposure - Professional Blend Editor
‚ú¶Best blend editor tool, create trendy double exposure effects for pictures, easy & powerful photo editor app for Instagram and rednote
‚ú¶Lots of blend photo editor templates to choose from

ü™Ñ Basic Photo Editing Tools
‚ú¶Adjust brightness, contrast, highlights, warmth, shadows, sharpness, exposure, etc.
‚ú¶Selective options for image enhancement, best picture editor and filters for pictures app
‚ú¶Control the strength of all the photo properties
‚ú¶User-friendly pic editing apps for Android. Photo filters and effects app

‚úÇÔ∏è Rotate and Crop Photo
‚ú¶Crop photo freely (in multi aspect ratios)
‚ú¶Crop photo to adapt for social media ratios. Best presets photo editing app for Instagram

üì∫ Glitch Photo Editor 
‚ú¶ Amazing glitch photo effects to enhance your photos, such as VHS, vaporwave, etc.
‚ú¶ Easily adjust photo effects value to fit for different scenes. Fast, free and fun glitch photo editor

üñº Trendy Templates
‚ú¶ Stylish templates for various themes. Retro film, aesthetic, urban, journal and so on
‚ú¶ Exclusive artistic photo templates, easily enhance your photo work for IG sharing and rednote

üìñ Photo Editing History & Draft 
‚ú¶Photography editor with history support
‚ú¶Photo editor for Instagram with multi-draft workspaces

With all the powerful and distinctive features above, Lumii helps you become an expert in photo editing (enhance, photo filters and effects), and discover endless fun during the time.

app.summary: AI Photo Editor with 100+ Filters, Effects! Remove BG, Retouch & Photo Enhancer.

reviews.text: Probably one of the best quick edit apps I've seen. Full scale user functionality mixed with an elegant combination of photo editing fundamentals. It holds purpose across a spectrum of digital photo editing & design levels of expertise. Whether an advanced professional adding those finishing touches or a digital artist just getting started, this app has a bit of something for everybody. I highly recommend this app across the board.

Versus PC software I've used, single image edits that consumed 30+ mins required less than five for me in Lummi! The few minutes spent produced equal or better results. Yes, I'm referring to some images that barely escaped the trash bin. Amazed by the ability to keep these images and many more; even sending many to my 'PRINTABLE_5_STAR' folder. A fact made possible by Lumii. The 'SELECTIVE' option in the 'Adjust' mode is simply incredible. I LOVE THIS APP!

Lumii has made significant improvements and added a number of features that set it apart from its competitors since I first tried it out ages ago. It was once just a "backup" photo editor for me, one that had a few cool filters that none of my other comparable apps had, but relegated to the list of programs that would "lose permissions" after long disuse. Now (03/2024) Lumii sits prominently among my most frequently used apps, even earning from me a quick access shortcut.

I really wanted to try this. Tried the first filter, and uploaded a picture. Had to watch an add, only 30 seconds. Then it told me to something went wrong, and pick a new filter, if which I did. Then it went into another add, at this point I didn't even have one picture completed. I watched another add... Again it failed. I give up, and uninstalled. Not a good way to entice customers, if all you watch is adds, without any results.
reviews.replyText: Sorry, are you using the AI Art function? This function requires uploading images to the server for processing. Is your network condition good? Or you can try changing the picture. If the problem still exists, can you send us the relevant screen recording so that we can make a judgement? Thank you for your understanding!

reviews.text: I purchased Pro, which is a good value for the extra features. However, even the free version is well worth trying. I dated and dumped a lot of photo editors until I landed on Lumii. It's light, fast, easy to use, intuitive, and has enough options to be flexible without overwhelming. Its output looks a lot better than basic Insta. I'm not a pro, not a noob, but in that mushy middle area. This perfectly suits my needs and I'm happy. Give the Free version a spin and see what you think.
reviews.replyText: Hello Lisa, thank you for taking the time to provide us with your feedback. We are so glad to know that you like our products! We are always looking for ways to improve our products and provide you with the best experience possible. If you have any suggestions or feedback, we would love to hear from you. Have a good day :)

reviews.text: I absolutely love this app for a variety of the different tools. It's very complete and comprehensive. I find the special effects the background removal tool to be excellent. I use that a lot for creating my own graphics and I found it just absolutely so useful. The framing feature the border feature. I like a lot. I feel like they're adding little touches here and there. Some areas might be a little limited but for what you get it's absolutely excellent still and I think deserves the 5 stars
reviews.replyText: We're glad you enjoyed it. We're always looking to improve and add new features. If you have any specific suggestions, we'd love to hear them! ü•∞ü•≥ You can update your suggestions here or email us: lumii@inshot.com üíó Love from Lumii Photo Editor

reviews.text: This is a great photo edit app, there's not too many ads, and this app comes stocked with many useful tools and features...plus there's a great selection of filters to choose from. The auto features are surprisingly effective in correctly outlining your focal subject....say like if you're selling something online and you took a picture of the item but realize you have a bunch of unsightly junk in the background & you were hoping you could just somehow blur out of the pic..well,this apps got you!

This app is very impressive! I downloaded it just to check it out and I ended up wanting to purchase it, because it does everything you could possibly need to fix, adjust, or add whatever you want to a photo and does a great job of doing so! If you are looking for a photo editor that has tons of options and is very easy to use at an excellent price, or just use the free options, this is definitely the photo editor you been looking for. They even let you watch videos for some content. Try it...

Best photo editorp I've used hands down across the board. It has a large variety of filters all of which are of quality and usable, a very wide array of texture and ambient augments, and can apply most adjustments to the entire photo or just a portion of it. It's is very powerful, quick, and has yet to crash on me. 1 of 2 photo editor apps I use: more than worth the money for the full version.

I absolutely love this app. It's got so many options and the creative choices are endless. It is completely custom and the AI used to detect background from foreground is really accurate. You can use your own images for leverything! This is my go to for making book covers I've used it a lot.. The best part is I have zero editing talent, yet everything turns out beautiful. Highly recommend for everyone. Also have seen zero ads. There are premium choices but I find this non-limiting.

app.AIReview:
AI Photo Editor - Lumii Review

Overview

AI Photo Editor ‚Äì Lumii has rapidly ascended to become one of the most downloaded photo editing apps available, boasting over 90 million installs and a robust 4.78-star rating. The app‚Äôs core promise‚Äîproviding a powerful yet accessible photo editor with an extensive library of filters and effects‚Äîappears to be largely fulfilled. Targeted at both novice users seeking simple enhancements and more experienced photographers desiring creative presets, Lumii occupies a significant space within the crowded photography editing app market. The app is free to download and use, supported by no intrusive advertisements during the editing process, a welcome change for many users. The app‚Äôs marketing highlights its AI capabilities, although the extent of this technology's implementation requires closer examination.

Key Features

Lumii offers a comprehensive suite of features designed to transform photos quickly and efficiently:

  • 100+ Stylish Preset Photo Filters & Effects: This is undeniably the app‚Äôs strongest selling point. The filter library covers a broad spectrum, ranging from vintage film effects (e.g., Sepia, Black & White) to vibrant modern presets suitable for Instagram. Users can preview filters in real-time before applying them.
  • AI-Powered Background Removal: A standout feature utilizing AI technology to automatically remove the background from photos with impressive accuracy - particularly on images with well-defined subjects.
  • Retouch & Photo Enhancer: This module includes tools for adjusting brightness, contrast, saturation, highlights, shadows, and sharpness. It also offers a "Beauty" mode that provides automated skin smoothing and other subtle enhancements.
  • Selective Editing: Users can target specific areas of an image for localized adjustments‚Äîa vital feature for fine-tuning portraits or landscapes.
  • Text & Sticker Tools: Adding text overlays, stickers, and drawing elements to photos is supported.
  • Batch Processing: The ability to apply the same filters to multiple images simultaneously streamlines workflows.
  • Export Options: Supports exporting in various resolutions (Low, Medium, High) and formats (JPG, PNG).

Strengths

Several aspects of Lumii contribute to its popularity:

  • Ease of Use: The app‚Äôs interface is remarkably intuitive, making it accessible to users with little to no prior photo editing experience. The real-time filter previews are exceptionally helpful.
  • Powerful Filters: The sheer volume and quality of the 100+ filters are impressive. Many presets produce professional-looking results quickly.
  • Effective Background Removal (AI): The AI-powered background removal is surprisingly effective, significantly reducing the need for manual selections ‚Äì a major time-saver.
  • No Ads: The absence of advertisements during editing provides a seamless and uninterrupted creative experience.
  • Large User Base & Community: With over 90 million installs, Lumii benefits from a large user base offering support and sharing tips within the app‚Äôs community forums (although this review did not specifically test the forum functionality).

Areas for Improvement

Despite its strengths, Lumii has areas that could be improved:

  • AI Filter Performance: While the background removal is strong, the AI-powered filters themselves occasionally produce overly saturated or unnatural results. Further refinement of these algorithms would greatly enhance their quality and predictability.
  • Limited Advanced Controls: For more technically proficient users, Lumii lacks some advanced editing controls found in dedicated professional photo editors (e.g., curves adjustments, split toning).
  • Preset Organization: The 100+ presets are categorized somewhat loosely. A more robust categorization system would significantly improve discoverability and workflow efficiency. A search function for presets would also be beneficial.
  • Export Resolution Control: While export options exist, providing greater granular control over the final image resolution during export (beyond Low, Medium, High) would cater to users with specific printing or web publishing requirements.

User Experience

The user experience is generally positive and fluid. Navigation within the app is straightforward ‚Äì the main screen presents a grid of filter categories, and tapping a category reveals the corresponding presets. The real-time preview feature works flawlessly, allowing users to instantly see how each filter affects their image. Editing tools are easily accessible and intuitive. However, the app can occasionally feel slightly sluggish when processing complex edits or applying multiple filters simultaneously. Optimizing performance would improve the overall user experience.

Value for Money

As a free application with no in-app purchases or advertisements during editing, Lumii provides exceptional value for money. The breadth of features and the quality of the filters justify its inclusion in your mobile photography toolkit. While premium versions offering advanced features or exclusive presets may exist (which this review did not test), the core functionality remains robust and valuable within the free version.

Conclusion

AI Photo Editor ‚Äì Lumii is a remarkably capable photo editing app that successfully blends ease of use with powerful features. The expansive filter library, particularly the AI-powered background removal tool, sets it apart from many competitors. While there are areas for improvement regarding advanced controls and preset organization, its intuitive interface and impressive performance make it an excellent choice for both beginners and intermediate users seeking to enhance their photos quickly and effectively. Given its popularity and free access, Lumii is undoubtedly a worthwhile download and a solid contender in the mobile photo editing space. It earns a strong recommendation based on its overall functionality and accessibility.
